extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the current Power Restore Policy enabled on the Xserve. Returned values include: "always-off", "always-on", "previous".
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/usr/bin/ipmitool" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/ipmitool chassis status | grep "Power Restore Policy" | awk '{print $5}'` echo "<result>$result</result>" fi
